amendment.description: To reaffirm the importance of community banking and community banking regulatory experience on the Federal Reserve Board of Governors, to ensure that the Federal Reserve Board of Governors has a member who has previous experience in community banking or community banking supervision.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3550 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3550 proposed by Senator Vitter.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3550 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3550 proposed by Senator Vitter.
